Profile Overview

I am a Software Engineer specializing in backend and web apps, I am driven by the desire to create impactful products.The most rewarding part of coding is knowing that my work makes a real difference and brings a sense of fulfillment to my life.

I have experience in Java and Spring Boot, and I can also handle frontend work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript. I also work with Docker and have experience maintaining, debugging, and troubleshooting legacy systems. Furthermore, I am always eager to learn and experiment with new technologies to continuously improve my skills.
